ValidationRule.description: CQ Value is required if Submitted to Customer Date is populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CONTAINS(Quote_Type__c, 'CQ'), NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin), $Profile.Name <> 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name <>'Integration API Only Profile', OR(ISNULL( CQ_Value__c ), CQ_Value__c < 0.0), NOT(ISBLANK(CQ_Submitted_to_Customer_Date__c )), CQ_isRebid_Done__c = False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "CQ Value" is required once "Submitted to Customer Date" is populated
